text: yagob-i malhagileul wanjeonhan po wileul danghaji anhneunhan geuleul delyeoon daneun geos-eul hananim-ui ileum-eulo maeng sehaji anhneundamyeon neohuiwa hamkke geu leul bonaeji anh-eulila malsseumhasini geudeul-eun maengsehadeola ie yagob-i hananim-eun uliga malhago issneun geos eul gamsihago gyesinila
